title: Dallas SWAT
resume: Dallas SWAT is a reality television show that followed the Dallas, Texas SWAT team. The series ran for 3 seasons starting from 2006 to 2007 and aired on the A&E Network. It also spawned two spin off shows, Detroit SWAT and Kansas City SWAT. Its popular theme song titled "Behind The Blue" was written and performed by Brooklyn, NY band The Shapes.

Login to create it. en Login Sign Up  ID: 10638   Expand Dallas SWAT   (2006) User Score Overview Dallas SWAT is a reality television show that followed the Dallas, Texas SWAT team. The series ran for 3 seasons starting from 2006 to 2007 and aired on the A&E Network. It also spawned two spin off shows, Detroit SWAT and Kansas City SWAT. Its popular theme song titled "Behind The Blue" was written and performed by Brooklyn, NY band The Shapes.
